hero.description: Transform your vehicle into a unique masterpiece with our professional wrapping and refinement services. We bring your vision to life.

about.title: Premium Vehicle Wrapping in Berlin
about.description: For over 10 years, we’ve been your trusted partner in high-quality vehicle refinement. With expertise in full wrapping, window tinting, and design wrapping, we deliver precision, quality, and satisfaction.

gallery.title: OUR WORK
gallery.subtitle: Explore Our Portfolio of Premium Vehicle Refinements
gallery.noItems: No items found in this category

features.title: Why Choose FolienSam ?
features.subtitle: Discover the Benefits of Our Premium Services

premiumMaterials.title: Premium Materials
premiumMaterials.description: Exclusive use of certified 3M, Hexis, and Avery films for maximum durability and a flawless finish.

perfectProcessing.title: Perfect Processing
perfectProcessing.description: Every detail is executed with the highest precision and craftsmanship to ensure a flawless result.

fastExecution.title: Fast Execution
fastExecution.description: Efficient processes ensure minimal downtime while maintaining maximum quality, so you can get back on the road quickly.

warranty.title: 5-Year Warranty
warranty.description: Comprehensive warranty on materials and workmanship for your peace of mind.

modernTechnology.title: State-of-the-Art Technology
modernTechnology.description: Use of the latest technologies and tools for optimal results and long-lasting wraps.

consultation.title: Personalized Consultation
consultation.description: Tailored advice and customized solutions to meet your individual needs and desires.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.subtitle: Professional Vehicle Refinement with Premium Materials

carWrapping.title: Full Car Wrap
carWrapping.description: Complete vehicle wrapping with premium films from 3M, Avery, or Hexis. Includes warranty and professional consultation.
carWrapping.fullDescription: Our full wrap transforms your vehicle entirely with high-quality films. We offer a wide range of colors and finishes, from matte to glossy, metallic, or with special effects.

windowTinting.title: Window Tinting
windowTinting.description: High-quality window tinting for UV protection and an elegant appearance. Certified films with maximum durability.
windowTinting.fullDescription: Professional window tinting with high-quality films for optimal UV protection, glare reduction, and an elegant appearance. All tints comply with legal regulations.

paintProtection.title: Paint Protection Film
paintProtection.description: Transparent protective film for maximum paint protection. Specifically designed for stone chips and other external impacts.
paintProtection.fullDescription: Protect your paint with our high-quality paint protection film. The transparent film offers maximum protection against stone chips, scratches, and environmental damage while remaining virtually invisible.

designWrapping.title: Design Wrapping
designWrapping.description: Custom design wrapping tailored to your preferences. From partial to full wraps in all colors and effects.
designWrapping.fullDescription: Bring your unique design ideas to life with our custom design wrapping. From subtle accents to bold full designs, we professionally execute your vision.

chromeWrapping.title: Chrome Wrapping
chromeWrapping.description: Elegant chrome wrapping for a unique look. Various shades and effects available.
chromeWrapping.fullDescription: Make a statement with our chrome wrapping. Choose from various chrome effects and shades for a guaranteed head-turner.

commercialWrapping.title: Commercial Wrapping
commercialWrapping.description: Professional vehicle branding and advertising wraps for your business. Corporate design and logo integration.
commercialWrapping.fullDescription: Transform your fleet into mobile advertisements. We professionally implement your corporate design, ensuring a consistent and high-quality appearance.

footer.brandDescription: Your first choice for professional vehicle refinement and wrapping in the region. We stand for quality, precision, and customer satisfaction.

impressum.title: Legal Notice
impressum.legalRequirement: Information according to § 5 TMG (German Telemedia Act)

content.title: Liability for Content
content.text: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 Abs.1 TMG under general law. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we are not obliged as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.

links.title: Liability for Links
links.text: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR). We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to us. We therefore process your data exclusively on the basis of legal provisions (GDPR, TMG). In this privacy policy, we inform you about the most important aspects of data processing within our website.

overview.title: General Information
content: You can generally use our website without providing personal data. Where personal data is collected on our pages, this is always done on a voluntary basis.
We point out that data transmission over the Internet may have security gaps. Complete protection of data from access by third parties is not possible.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
content: When you visit our website, technical information is automatically recorded that your browser sends to our server. This includes: browser type and version, operating system used, referrer URL, hostname of the accessing computer, time of server request and IP address.
This data cannot be assigned to specific persons. This data is not merged with other data sources.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
content: The data you provide is used exclusively to process your inquiries and to provide our services.
Data is only passed on to third parties if this is necessary for contract fulfillment or if you have expressly consented.

cookies.title: Cookies
content: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer and saved by your browser.
Most of the cookies we use are so-called session cookies. They are automatically deleted after your visit. Other cookies remain stored on your device until you delete them.
You can configure your browser to inform you about the setting of cookies and only allow cookies in individual cases.

rights.title: Your Rights
content: You generally have the rights to information, correction, deletion, restriction, data portability and objection.
If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law, you can complain to the supervisory authority.
You have the right to revoke your data protection consent at any time.

contactForm.title: Contact Form
content: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form including the contact details you provided there will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.
We do not pass on this data without your consent. Processing is based on Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.youtube: Our website uses YouTube to embed videos. The operator is YouTube, LLC, 901 Cherry Ave., San Bruno, CA 94066, USA. When you visit a page with embedded YouTube videos, a connection to YouTube servers is established. The YouTube server is informed which of our pages you have visited. Further information can be found in YouTube's privacy policy.
thirdParty.googleMaps: This website uses Google Maps to display maps. The operator is Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland. When using Google Maps, data about your usage is transmitted to Google and stored on servers in the USA.
thirdParty.whatsapp: We offer WhatsApp as a contact option. WhatsApp is a service of WhatsApp Ireland Limited. When using it, your data is processed in accordance with WhatsApp's privacy policy.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against accidental or intentional manipulation, loss, destruction or access by unauthorized persons. Our security measures are continuously improved in line with technological developments.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy so that it always complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services.
